text: The Macedonia national junior handball team is the national under–20 Handball team of Macedonia, representing Macedonia in international matches. ==Current squad== The following squad was selected for the 2017 Men's Junior World Handball Championship .International Handball Federation Head coach: Ilija Temelkovski Assistant coach: Ice Sokoleski == References == ==External links== * *IHF profile Category:Men's national junior handball teams Category:Handball in North Macedonia Handball
title: North Macedonia national junior handball team
